review: I love this thing so much more than the Roku I owned previously... but this thing still has some room for VERY simple improvements.While voice search it great, it only works with Amazon movies - really wish it would work with other services, since I rarely use Amazon to watch movies/TV (mostly Netflix and YouTube here).My main concern: The only way to restart the box is by unplugging the unit. This is *incredibly* frustrating, considering it loses connection about once every 20-30 minutes in my apartment, and cannot reconnect, no matter how many times I push "Try again" (to reconnect) - but as soon as I unplug it and replug it in, it works perfectly fine. If this happened once a month - or even once a week, it would be one thing, but I have to unplug this thing at least once or twice each hour I am using it. Amazon, PLEASE devote a button on the remote to be a "reset" button when held for 5-10 seconds (I would have thought the Home button would have done this - but according to the manual, the only way to restart is by unplugging it manually).
